name: Aisha Rahman
persona: Aisha Rahman is a 20-year-old Biology major with a CGPA of 3.14. She is a diligent student who sets solid academic goals and perseveres through challenges, even if she sometimes struggles with test anxiety. Aisha is fairly self-disciplined and believes in her ability to succeed, though she knows there is room to grow. She is motivated by her interest in science and hopes to pursue a career in healthcare.
